text: nim'ma paiki visvasigalagiddu satkarma maduttiruvavarige, avara hindinavarante avarannu tanu bhumiyalli adalitagararagi maduvenendu hagu tanu avara palige mecciruva avara dharmavannu avarigagi sthiragolisuvenendu mattu avara bhayada sthitiyanne tanu a balika santiya sthitiyagi badalisuvenendu allahanu vagdana madiruvanu. Avaru nannanne pujisali mattu nanna jote enannu serisadirali (endu avanu adesisiruvanu). Istada balikavu krtaghnate toruvavare avidheyaru
